entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
